channel.title: [pi] Votefor command? [pi]
channel.description:
hi everyone, ive tried and tried to do this right but im not getting anything from it, can someone please make me a ::votefor (playernamehere) command? id really like to have one for my server so i can make people vote, if you can help it would really be awesome.
::votefor would basically open up the vote pages for another player. i know there are commands like it so that itll open for the entire server but since i have vote for cash, its easyest to have it only go to one player. so again if you could help it would be awesome

item.title: [pi] Votefor command? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

if (playerCommand.equals("govote") && c.playerRights == 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.runelocus.com/toplist/index.php?action=vote&id=22088", 12000); c2.sendMessage("Please vote every day to keep us alive and get more players ^__^"); } }

Read full topic
